message: The 'quantity' parameter is mandatory in a request, under 'Items' 000020. The 'type' parameter is mandatory in a request, under 'Locations'. The 'zipCode' parameter is mandatory in a request, under 'Locations'. The 'country' parameter is mandatory in a request, under 'Locations'. The 'type' parameter, with one of the following values: CONTRACT_FROM, SHIP_FROM, is mandatory in this request. Add this parameter in an entry, under 'Locations'.
